Works perfect on win 7 64. Thanks dopeman. Could you upload cutscenes for Double Agent?

It works on Win7 32-bit well. But some users might be confused when they try to run pandora.exe, which has error (game cannot start).

Firstly, run the setup.reg to store the registry, then go to the Splinter Cell folder - open OFFLINE folder > SYSTEM folder > SplinterCell2.exe

Then the game should start! If you have problem with game exit, then you should delete pandora.exe and pandora_tomorrow.exe

Aw... why you people just give me problems...
I would like to play this game today, since I'm with some connection problems and having an offline game its the solution... Downloaded, runned the setup file... tried to play with pandora.exe and it doesn't work, after I click on "Single Player" it closes and nothing else opens. Tried to follow what Boiishuvo said, but I got no such thing as "SplinterCell2.exe" on my Offline->System folder, nor on the sub-folders of system. Any tip?

OK, found out problem... Kaspersky detected something on SplinterCell2.exe and deleted it. Then, by mistake, I deleted filters in "Detected" window, when I was just trying to delete one of the filters, and now can't retrieve the file. Gotta re-download and disable Kaspersky. What is this shit attached to SplinterCell2.exe, anyways? Some "dybalom.eoc" or something?
